name: The Great Fleece (Gerald Clark)
description:
This is a project I created with the free asset bundle, The Great Fleece,  from the Unity Asset Store. This project focuses heavily on Cinematography by making use of Cinemachine and Timeline to handle cutscenes. 

This is a point and click movement based game where Darren, the player character, must sneak his way past several guards, security cameras, obtain a keycard and head into the main vault of the auction house to gain access to the millions of dollars worth of items!
